dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: Select the data source to scrape.

arcgisUrl.title: ArcGIS FeatureServer URL (Miami-Dade)
arcgisUrl.description: Full URL to the FeatureServer/0 endpoint. Required if Source is miami-dade-arcgis.

county.title: County ID (Florida Only)
county.description: The county ID to scrape (e.g., 8 for Brevard).

pageStart.title: Start Page (Florida Only)
pageStart.description: Page number to start scraping from.

pageEnd.title: End Page (Florida Only)
pageEnd.description: Page number to stop scraping at (inclusive). Leave empty to scrape all available pages.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages processed in parallel.

minDelayMs.title: Min Delay (ms)
minDelayMs.description: Minimum delay in milliseconds between requests to reduce rate limiting.

emitWebhook.title: Emit Webhook
emitWebhook.description: If true, sends the scraped data to the configured Webhook URL.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: The URL to send the scraped data to.

webhookAuthToken.title: Webhook Auth Token
webhookAuthToken.description: Optional Bearer token for webhook authentication.
